simple.name: EqRadius
simple.description: Radius that establishes a comparison between translations and rotations. Consider a pure rotation around an axis; the equivalent radius variable will define the amount of 'translation' motion by measuring the arc formed by the angle specified, described at the equivalent radius. For more information check (http://docs.ros.org/hydro/api/orocos_kdl/html/classKDL_1_1Path__Line.html)
